name: Gourmet Grab
description:
Gourmet Grab

Catch the falling food, and avoid the bombs! Use your mouse to steer the platform left and right.

Notes:

Thanks for playing! This game was made in 7 days using the Godot game engine. I spent around 2 hours daily on this project, and it was made with the idea of making an endless, glitch-less, and simple game. I am not an experienced game developer, so there definitely will be issues with the game. This won't be worked on further, because I'm learning game development further, and most likely moving to Unity, to make larger scale projects.
